ocean.question: I have many legs, but I can't walk on land. I live in the sea and sometimes pinch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I'm a popular seafood.
🚶 I move sideways.
🏠 I live in shells.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and home to many creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I cover most of the Earth.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🧂 I taste salty.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean. I’m known for my singing.

hints.text: 🐳 I am very large.
🗣️ I communicate through songs.
🌊 I breathe air.

ocean.question: I am a colorful home for many sea creatures, made of tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Fish love to swim around me.
🧱 I am made of living things.
☀️ I need sunlight to survive.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a very flat body. I can sometimes shock you.

hints.text: 🐡 I hide on the ocean floor.
⚡️ Some kinds can use electricity.
👁️ My eyes are both on the same side of my body.

ocean.question: I am a type of creature that is mostly water and floats in the sea. I sting!

hints.text: 🌊 I drift with the currents.
⚫ I don't have bones.
🩹 You should put vinegar on my sting.

ocean.question: I am a slow creature with a shell on my back and I lay my eggs on the beach.

hints.text: 🐢 I am a reptile.
🏝️ I travel long distances to lay eggs.
🥬 I eat seagrass.

ocean.question: I'm a large sea bird that is known for stealing food from other birds. What am I?

hints.text: 🦅 I can fly for long periods of time.
🍟 I might steal your french fries at the beach.
⚪ I am often white with grey wings.

ocean.question: I am a strong current in the ocean that carries warm water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I affect the weather.
🇺🇸 I travel up the east coast of North America.
➡️ I am like a river in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. It's so dark and cold down there! What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Very little light reaches me.
🚢 No one has been to the bottom of me yet.
🌊 I'm a trench in the Pacific Ocean.

food.question: I am yellow and curved, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A popular fruit often eaten by primates
💛 My color is often associated with sunshine
⚽️ I come in a peel and you can slip on it

food.question: I am round and red, and I grow on a tree. An apple a day keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I can be sweet or tart, depending on the variety
🥧 I am often used to make pies and other desserts
👩🏻‍⚕️ People say eating me helps keep you healthy

food.question: I am white and fluffy, and I come from a hen. You can scramble me or make an omelet. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I am laid by a bird
🍳 I can be cooked in many different ways
🎂 I am often used in baking cakes

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
🐰 I am a favorite food of rabbits
👓 Eating me is rumored to improve your eyesight

food.question: I am made from milk, and I can be hard or soft. Mice like me a lot. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I come in many different flavors and textures
🥛 I am often served with crackers or bread
🐭 A cartoon mouse loves to eat me

food.question: I am a grain that is cooked in water, often eaten with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 Many countries consider me a staple food.
🌎 I can be white, brown, or even black.
🍣 I am used in a popular type of sushi.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh. I'm a good source of Vitamin C. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My name is also the name of a bird.
🥄 You can scoop out my insides with a spoon.
🌿 I grow on vines.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, fried until golden brown, and often served with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am a popular side dish.
🇺🇸 I'm often found at fast food restaurants.
🧂 People love to sprinkle salt on me.

food.question: I am a drink made from squeezing oranges. I am often enjoyed with breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I come directly from a citrus fruit.
☀️ Many people have me in the morning.
🥤 You can buy me in a carton or make me fresh.

food.question: I am a treat that's cold and sweet, often made with fruit and cream. I come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦I'm a popular dessert, especially in the summer.
🥄 You eat me with a spoon.
🌈 I can be many different colors.
